content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Permissions to send messages to Location, Org Everyone, Org Employees, Org Contractors DGs have been revoked from many users and DGs upon decision of Org Global Operations. It was made to avoid spamming EPAMers.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To be able to send messages to Location, Org Everyone, Org Contractors and/or Org Employees DGs group a person/DG needs to be added to a corresponding \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Allow to Broadcast\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" group personally or through a DG membership (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"preferable option!\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\")\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Also, Messages sent to some Location DGs (i.e., country / city / office) / Org Everyone / Org Employees  undergo moderation, i.e., before an e-mail is delivered to recipients, a moderator (=e-mail approver) should press an appropriate button to allow delivery.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Read article \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/5aMbMw\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Managing permissions to send emails to Global DG\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to learn who and how can be granted permissions to send such messages.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
